name: ActualConversion Inc.
description: Developer of data insights software designed to make better business decisions. The company's platform collects data generated by various marketing platforms used by a business, then filters and normalizes that data into a universal language with relevant business insights and recommendations, enabling businesses to streamline their marketing campaigns.
